name: Tonder
description:
The popular dating app "Tonder" has been hit by a weird glitch that prevents you from "liking" users that share a certain feature. Can you find the pattern and identify the glitch?

How to Play:

  • You can like or dislike people by using the on-screen buttons or by swiping their pictures left or right.
  • Start by liking everyone and pay attention to who gets rejected.
  • Once you figure out who is being targeted by the glitch, dislike those people so that you get 10 successful likes in a row.
  • An example glitch is one that affects only people with glasses, but there are many other possible glitches.

Info:

Created for the JS13k game jam competition in August 2016, which had the theme "glitch". Currently, there is no music or sound effects.
